trans-unit.source: The base exception type for all COM interop exceptions and structured exception handling (SEH) exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Unntakstypen basis for alle interop COM-unntak og strukturert unntaksbehandling (SEH) unntak.

trans-unit.source: To enhance interoperability between legacy systems and the common language runtime, the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A> property stores an integer value (HRESULT) that identifies the error.
trans-unit.target: Å forbedre interoperabilitet mellom eldre systemer og common language runtime den <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A>egenskapen lagrer en heltallsverdi (HRESULT) som identifiserer feilen.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: User defined exceptions should never derive from `ExternalException`, and an `ExternalException` should never be thrown by user code.
trans-unit.target: Brukerdefinerte unntak aldri må avledes fra `ExternalException`, og en `ExternalException` aldri bli utløst av brukerkode.

trans-unit.source: Use the specific exceptions that derive from `ExternalException` instead.
trans-unit.target: Bruk bestemt unntak som er avledet fra `ExternalException` i stedet.

trans-unit.source: `ExternalException` uses the HRESULT E_FAIL which has the value 0x80004005.
trans-unit.target: `ExternalException`bruker HRESULT E_FAIL som har verdien 0x80004005.

trans-unit.source: `ExternalException` uses the default <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> implementation, which supports reference equality.
trans-unit.target: `ExternalException`standard <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>implementering, som støtter referanse likhet.</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial values for an instance of `ExternalException`, see the `ExternalException` constructors.
trans-unit.target: En liste over opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av `ExternalException`, kan du se den `ExternalException` konstruktører.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""> </xref> klasse standardegenskapene.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of `ExternalException`.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av `ExternalException`.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|A localized error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| En nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic). | | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| En lokalisert feil melding streng. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""> </xref> klassen med en angitt feilmelding.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of `ExternalException`.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av `ExternalException`.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| En nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic). | | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Feil melding strengen. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that specifies the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: Feilmelding som angir årsaken til unntaket.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref> class from serialization data.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""> </xref> klassen fra serialiseringsdataene.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren kalles under deserialisering til reconstitute unntak objektet overføres via en dataflyt.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [XML og SOAP-serialisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som har datatypen serialiserte objektet.

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: Kontekstavhengig informasjon om kilden eller målet.

trans-unit.source: info is .
trans-unit.target: infois .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException"> </xref> klassen med en angitt feilmelding og en referanse til det interne unntaket er årsaken til dette unntaket.

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Et unntak som er registrert som en direkte resultatet av et tidligere unntak må inkludere en referanse til det tidligere unntaket i den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>returnerer samme verdi som er sendt til konstruktøren, eller `null` hvis den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen leverer ikke internt unntak verdien til konstruktøren.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| Referansen for det indre unntaket. | | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Feil melding strengen. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: Feilmelding som forklarer hvorfor unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket er årsaken til den gjeldende unntaket.

trans-unit.source: If the `inner` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `inner` -parameteren er ikke <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, oppstår det gjeldende unntaket i en <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""> </xref> blokken som behandler det interne unntaket.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref> class with a specified error message and the HRESULT of the error.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""> </xref> klassen med en angitt feilmelding og HRESULT til denne feilen.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of `ExternalException`.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av `ExternalException`.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A>|The HRESULT of the error.| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A>| HRESULT til denne feilen. | | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| En nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic). | | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Feil melding strengen. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that specifies the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: Feilmelding som angir årsaken til unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The HRESULT of the error.
trans-unit.target: HRESULT til denne feilen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_HRESULT" name="HRESULT" href=""></xref> of the error.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref uid="langword_csharp_HRESULT" name="HRESULT" href=""> </xref> til denne feilen.

trans-unit.source: See [Common HRESULT values](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa378137.aspx) for a list of the more frequently encountered error codes.
trans-unit.target: Se [vanlige HRESULT verdier](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa378137.aspx) for en liste over mer støtte ofte feilkoder.

trans-unit.source: `HRESULT` values are defined in the Winerror.h header file.
trans-unit.target: `HRESULT`verdier som er definert i Winerror.h hovedpostfil.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_HRESULT" name="HRESULT" href=""></xref> of the error.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_HRESULT" name="HRESULT" href=""> </xref> til denne feilen.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the HRESULT of the error.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en streng som inneholder HRESULT til denne feilen.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the HRESULT.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer HRESULT.
